record.title: AUTHORITY TO MAKE APPOINTMENTS

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that notwithstanding the recess or adjournment of the Senate, the President of the Senate, the President pro tempore, and the majority and minority leaders be authorized to make appointments to commissions, committees, boards, conferences, or interparliamentary conferences authorized by law, by concurrent action of the two Houses, or by order of the Senate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
